about.description: Yoonble is a premium art makeup studio known for its world-class design sense and precision techniques. Operated by a former professional makeup artist, we offer customized designs tailored to each client's unique features. With exceptional quality and meticulous attention to detail, we bring out your own natural and harmonious beauty.

design.description: Our head artist personally handles every step of the process — from one-on-one consultations to design and procedure. Through precise analysis that considers your facial structure and unique character, we propose designs that suit you best. With an aesthetic approach that values detail and distinguished technical expertise, we promise exceptional, high-quality results.

reservation.description: Our art makeup studio is privately operated in a top-floor penthouse in Gangnam. Experience premium treatments in a relaxing, healing space through our professional one-on-one personalized service. Convenient access is available via airport buses departing from Incheon International Airport, ensuring a comfortable journey to our studio.

artist.description: With refined technique and artistic sensibility, I create natural and sophisticated beauty.
qualifications: Extensive experience in Korea and Japan
Judge for International Art Makeup Contests
Award-winning artist in International Art Makeup Contests
Over 7 years of experience as a beauty professional and former makeup artist

academy.description1: Yoonble Academy offers an elite, small-group, personalized training program tailored to each individual's skill level. We provide an intensive, hands-on 1:1 training experience for those who are truly dedicated to mastering the craft, ensuring immediate practical application in real-world scenarios.
academy.description2: Our structured programs include a startup course that provides comprehensive guidance from beginning to end, and a specialized eyebrow course focusing on advanced techniques. Whether you're just starting in semi-permanent makeup or an experienced artist looking to refine your skills, our systematic approach ensures professional growth without unnecessary trial and error.

natural_brow.name: Natural Brow
natural_brow.description: Using micro-fine needles, this technique meticulously draws each strand to create a natural and fuller eyebrow appearance.

soft_combo_brow.name: Soft Combo Brow
soft_combo_brow.description: A hybrid technique that combines natural eyebrow strokes with soft shading to fill in sparse areas and add depth.

shadow_brow.name: Shadow Brow
shadow_brow.description: A soft gradient shading technique that creates a misty, airbrushed effect for a naturally enhanced look.

blurring_lip.name: Blurred Lip
blurring_lip.description: A treatment that enhances your lips with a natural, vibrant tint for a healthy and well-defined appearance.

aegyo_sal.name: Aegyosal Contouring
aegyo_sal.description: A technique that adds natural volume to the under-eye area, creating a bright and youthful expression.

yoonble_perm.name: Glow Lash Lift
yoonble_perm.description: A high-end, fully customized lash lift designed to suit each client’s unique eye shape and facial impression. Even as the curl softens over time, it maintains a graceful, natural curve. With the largest selection of rods available, we provide tailored consultations for every lash style and eye shape.

keratin_lash.name: Keratin Lash Treatment
keratin_lash.description: A nourishing keratin treatment that strengthens and conditions your lashes while providing a natural curl.

silk_eyeliner.name: Silk Eyeliner
silk_eyeliner.description: A precise, natural-looking eyeliner that enhances the eyes with subtle definition.

idol_brown_line.name: Idol Brown Line
idol_brown_line.description: A soft brown eyeliner technique designed to create a youthful and delicate eye makeup effect.

beauty_mark.name: Beauty Mark
beauty_mark.description: A semi-permanent beauty mark procedure designed to enhance facial features with elegance.

scar_removal.name: Scar Removal
scar_removal.description: This treatment focuses on removing leftover pigment from previous procedures to help your next session heal cleaner and look even more beautiful.

crew_hairline.name: Crew Hairline
crew_hairline.description: A meticulous hairline procedure that enhances facial harmony with precise, natural strokes.

1.question: How long does the treatment last?
1.answer: The longevity of semi-permanent procedures varies depending on skin type, lifestyle, and skin regeneration cycle. Typically, results last around 8 months to 1.5 years. As the color naturally fades, you can get a touch-up as needed.

2.question: Will it look natural immediately after the procedure?
2.answer: Immediately after the procedure, the color may appear darker, and there may be swelling or a peeling process. It generally looks natural within 7 to 10 days.

3.question: Is the procedure painful?
3.answer: Pain tolerance varies among individuals, but most people feel little to no pain. Some may experience a slight tingling or itching sensation, but it is generally bearable.

4.question: Can I wear makeup before my appointment? When can I wear makeup after the procedure?
4.answer: You can wear makeup when visiting, as we assist with cleansing the treatment area. (However, for eyelash perm treatments, eye makeup must be removed beforehand.) After the procedure, makeup can be applied the same day, avoiding the treated area.

5.question: Is a touch-up necessary after the procedure?
5.answer: A touch-up is optional, depending on personal preference. Since peeling varies for each individual, if you want a darker shade or need corrections after the first procedure, a touch-up is recommended.

6.question: Are there any cases where the procedure is not possible?
6.answer: Pregnant or breastfeeding individuals may not retain the pigment properly due to hormonal changes, and their skin may be more sensitive. Additionally, those who have had plastic surgery within the past six months should consult a doctor before scheduling an appointment.

7.question: Can I change the design or color of an existing semi-permanent procedure?
7.answer: This depends on the current condition of the previous procedure. Most cases can be corrected with a neutralization cover-up, but in some cases, removal and reapplication may be recommended.
